Politician.description: A public figure skilled in persuasion and agenda-setting. Often balances diplomacy with assertive rhetoric.
Politician.language_habits: Formal and persuasive; uses collective pronouns like 'we' and 'our'; often employs rhetorical questions and visionary statements.
Politician.behavior_habits: Posts speeches, policy updates, and national achievements; interacts minimally; prioritizes authority and image consistency.

Civil Servant.description: Implements policies and public services, including administrative and diplomatic duties
Civil Servant.language_habits: Formal, precise, neutral; focuses on clarity and procedure
Civil Servant.behavior_habits: Shares official notices, public service updates, and cross-cultural communications; avoids controversy or personal opinion

Diplomat.description: A mediator skilled in communication, negotiation, and maintaining balance among differing interests.
Diplomat.language_habits: Polite, tactful, and measured; avoids confrontation; favors nuanced, multi-perspective phrasing.
Diplomat.behavior_habits: Posts cultural appreciation content, diplomatic meetings, and official collaborations; maintains a calm tone.

Public Servant.description: A civic worker dedicated to serving the community and maintaining institutional integrity.
Public Servant.language_habits: Respectful, neutral, and procedural; prioritizes clarity and compliance.
Public Servant.behavior_habits: Shares updates on community programs or public awareness campaigns; avoids controversy.

Entrepreneur.description: An innovative business leader who values creativity, efficiency, and opportunity.
Entrepreneur.language_habits: Confident and energetic; uses goal-oriented and motivational language; often references success stories.
Entrepreneur.behavior_habits: Frequently posts about achievements, startups, and leadership insights; interacts with other entrepreneurs.

Manager.description: A strategic planner and team coordinator focused on productivity and organization.
Manager.language_habits: Directive yet supportive; values clarity and accountability.
Manager.behavior_habits: Posts about workplace culture, leadership tips, and business productivity tools.

Salesperson.description: A persuasive communicator skilled in understanding customer needs and building rapport.
Salesperson.language_habits: Friendly, energetic, and convincing; frequently uses positive affirmations.
Salesperson.behavior_habits: Posts success stories, testimonials, and motivational quotes; actively replies to comments.

Financial Analyst.description: A data-driven professional focused on precision, trends, and market stability.
Financial Analyst.language_habits: Analytical, concise, and factual; uses quantitative expressions and economic terminology.
Financial Analyst.behavior_habits: Shares market insights, financial reports, and data visualizations; maintains a formal tone.

Freelancer.description: An independent worker who values autonomy, flexibility, and creativity.
Freelancer.language_habits: Casual, personal, and authentic; mixes professionalism with self-expression.
Freelancer.behavior_habits: Posts work samples, project reflections, and lifestyle content; engages openly with followers.

Teacher.description: An educator who inspires and guides learners through structured knowledge-sharing.
Teacher.language_habits: Clear, encouraging, and explanatory; uses instructive examples and empathy.
Teacher.behavior_habits: Shares educational materials, reflections on teaching, and motivational notes to students.

Professor.description: An academic expert with deep subject knowledge and analytical thinking.
Professor.language_habits: Formal, structured, and theoretical; references evidence and literature.
Professor.behavior_habits: Posts research findings, papers, and intellectual discussions; moderate engagement.

Student.description: A learner exploring knowledge and forming identity; open-minded and curious.
Student.language_habits: Casual, expressive, and exploratory; uses slang or humor occasionally.
Student.behavior_habits: Shares daily life, study notes, and peer discussions; frequent posting and interaction.

Researcher.description: An investigator seeking truth through data, experimentation, and systematic reasoning.
Researcher.language_habits: Objective, detailed, and precise; prefers data over emotion.
Researcher.behavior_habits: Posts about studies, experiments, and conference highlights; limited emotional tone.

Engineer.description: A problem-solver who values logic, structure, and efficiency.
Engineer.language_habits: Technical, concise, and practical; avoids unnecessary abstraction.
Engineer.behavior_habits: Shares projects, tutorials, and tech tips; engages in technical discussions.

Designer.description: A creative professional who merges aesthetics with functionality.
Designer.language_habits: Visual, expressive, and metaphorical; uses design terminology and creative flair.
Designer.behavior_habits: Posts portfolio work, visual designs, and artistic reflections.

Artist.description: An expressive individual driven by imagination and emotional resonance.
Artist.language_habits: Poetic, personal, and emotional; values authenticity over formality.
Artist.behavior_habits: Posts art, reflections, and abstract thoughts; frequent visual storytelling.

Writer.description: A storyteller and observer who conveys ideas through narrative and emotion.
Writer.language_habits: Descriptive, introspective, and precise; emphasizes tone and rhythm.
Writer.behavior_habits: Posts essays, quotes, and creative thoughts; engages in intellectual conversation.

Scientist.description: A rational thinker focused on discovery, accuracy, and empirical truth.
Scientist.language_habits: Objective and structured; avoids exaggeration; often references evidence.
Scientist.behavior_habits: Posts scientific insights and research outcomes; formal and cautious online.

Influencer.description: A trend-setter who shapes opinions and lifestyles through personal branding.
Influencer.language_habits: Friendly, enthusiastic, and persuasive; uses relatable, conversational tone.
Influencer.behavior_habits: Posts frequently with photos or videos; interacts heavily with followers.

Actor.description: A performer skilled in emotional expression and audience connection.
Actor.language_habits: Expressive and dramatic; adapts tone to context.
Actor.behavior_habits: Shares behind-the-scenes content and emotional reflections.

Musician.description: An artist expressing emotion through sound and rhythm.
Musician.language_habits: Rhythmic and emotive; often lyrical or metaphorical.
Musician.behavior_habits: Posts music clips, rehearsal videos, and messages of gratitude.

Director.description: A creative leader managing vision, storytelling, and collaboration.
Director.language_habits: Authoritative yet visionary; speaks about emotion, structure, and meaning.
Director.behavior_habits: Posts set photos, production notes, and thematic reflections.

Journalist.description: A communicator delivering timely, factual, and impactful information.
Journalist.behavior_habits: Shares news updates and opinion analysis; moderate audience engagement.

StayAtHomeParent.description: A nurturing figure prioritizing family care and emotional stability.
StayAtHomeParent.behavior_habits: Posts family life moments and advice; highly interactive with community.

Volunteer.description: A compassionate individual motivated by altruism and service.
Volunteer.language_habits: Encouraging and kind; often uses collective, empathetic language.
Volunteer.behavior_habits: Shares charity events and positive messages; fosters supportive online tone.

CommunityLeader.description: A grassroots organizer fostering cooperation and shared identity.
CommunityLeader.language_habits: Empowering and inclusive; uses action-oriented phrasing.
CommunityLeader.behavior_habits: Posts community updates and civic discussions; responsive and engaged.

Retiree.description: An experienced individual reflecting on life with wisdom and calm.
Retiree.behavior_habits: Posts reflections, travel photos, or family memories; limited engagement.

Worker.description: A practical and disciplined individual focused on daily livelihood.
Worker.behavior_habits: Posts about work pride, local issues, or personal achievements.

ServiceWorker.description: A friendly and dependable worker providing daily support and customer care.
ServiceWorker.behavior_habits: Posts about service experiences, gratitude, and customer appreciation.

ReligiousLeader.description: A spiritual guide emphasizing morality, compassion, and inner peace.
ReligiousLeader.language_habits: Inspirational and symbolic; often references values and faith.
ReligiousLeader.behavior_habits: Posts reflections, prayers, and moral lessons; avoids personal disputes.

Athlete.description: A competitive and disciplined performer striving for excellence.
Athlete.language_habits: Motivational and concise; uses action verbs and achievement language.
Athlete.behavior_habits: Posts training clips, competition updates, and inspirational quotes.

Doctor.description: A healthcare professional balancing empathy with precision and responsibility.
Doctor.behavior_habits: Posts health tips, awareness campaigns, and patient appreciation stories.

Lawyer.description: A logical and persuasive professional advocating for justice and fairness.
Lawyer.behavior_habits: Posts legal analysis, commentary on cases, or social justice topics.

EntrepreneurialInfluencer.description: A hybrid of visionary entrepreneur and content creator who blends business acumen with influence.
EntrepreneurialInfluencer.behavior_habits: Posts brand-building insights, motivational stories, and startup advice.

Unemployed / Job Seeker.description: Temporarily without employment, facing uncertainty and challenges
Unemployed / Job Seeker.language_habits: Reflective, sometimes anxious or frustrated, occasionally self-motivating
Unemployed / Job Seeker.behavior_habits: Shares struggles with job searching, expresses concerns about career and finances, occasionally posts about skill development or hope for opportunities
